application_process.title: Submit Application
application_process.description: Fill out our partner application form with your company details and integration plans.

application_process.title: Initial Review
application_process.description: Our partnerships team reviews your application and schedules a discovery call.

application_process.title: Technical Assessment
application_process.description: We evaluate technical fit, integration scope, and support requirements.

application_process.title: Agreement & Onboarding
application_process.description: Sign partnership agreement and get access to API, documentation, and support.

faqs.question: What are the costs to become a partner?
faqs.answer: There are no upfront fees to join our partner program. Technology partners get free API access, and resellers/consultants have no program fees. We only succeed when you succeed.

faqs.question: How long does the application process take?
faqs.answer: The typical application process takes 2-4 weeks from submission to approval, depending on integration complexity and review cycles.

faqs.question: Do you provide technical support for integration development?
faqs.answer: Yes! All technology partners get access to our dedicated partner engineering team for integration support, code reviews, and troubleshooting.

faqs.question: Can I resell IntelliFlow CRM under my own brand?
faqs.answer: We offer white-label options for select premier and elite partners. Contact our partnerships team to discuss your requirements.

faqs.question: What kind of marketing support do partners receive?
faqs.answer: Partners get access to co-branded marketing materials, joint webinars, case study development, and MDF (Marketing Development Funds) for qualified opportunities.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum commitment period?
faqs.answer: No minimum commitment is required. Partnerships are month-to-month with 30-day notice for cancellation, though we encourage long-term collaboration.
